entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
